Description:
An adversary may use legitimate desktop support and remote access software, such as Team Viewer, Go2Assist, LogMein, AmmyyAdmin, etc, to establish an interactive command and control channel to target systems within networks.
These services are commonly used as legitimate technical support software, and may be allowed by application control within a target environment.
Remote access tools like VNC, Ammyy, and Teamviewer are used frequently when compared with other legitimate software commonly used by adversaries. (Citation: Symantec Living off the Land)


Author: frack113, Connor Martin
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS Query To Remote Access Software Domain From Non-Browser App
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((query_name like '%.rustdesk.com' and query_name like 'rs-%') or (query_name like '%agent.jumpcloud.com' or query_name like '%agentreporting.atera.com' or query_name like '%ammyy.com' or query_name like '%api.parsec.app' or query_name like '%api.playanext.com' or query_name like '%api.splashtop.com' or query_name like '%app.atera.com' or query_name like '%assist.zoho.com' or query_name like '%authentication.logmeininc.com' or query_name like '%beyondtrustcloud.com' or query_name like '%cdn.kaseya.net' or query_name like '%client.teamviewer.com' or query_name like '%comserver.corporate.beanywhere.com' or query_name like '%control.connectwise.com' or query_name like '%downloads.zohocdn.com' or query_name like '%dwservice.net' or query_name like '%express.gotoassist.com' or query_name like '%getgo.com' or query_name like '%getscreen.me' or query_name like '%integratedchat.teamviewer.com' or query_name like '%join.zoho.com' or query_name like '%kickstart.jumpcloud.com' or query_name like '%license.bomgar.com' or query_name like '%logmein-gateway.com' or query_name like '%logmein.com' or query_name like '%logmeincdn.http.internapcdn.net' or query_name like '%n-able.com' or query_name like '%net.anydesk.com' or query_name like '%netsupportsoftware.com' or query_name like '%parsecusercontent.com' or query_name like '%pubsub.atera.com' or query_name like '%relay.kaseya.net' or query_name like '%relay.screenconnect.com' or query_name like '%relay.splashtop.com' or query_name like '%remoteassistance.support.services.microsoft.com' or query_name like '%remotedesktop-pa.googleapis.com' or query_name like '%remoteutilities.com' or query_name like '%secure.logmeinrescue.com' or query_name like '%services.vnc.com' or query_name like '%static.remotepc.com' or query_name like '%swi-rc.com' or query_name like '%swi-tc.com' or query_name like '%tailscale.com' or query_name like '%telemetry.servers.qetqo.com' or query_name like '%tmate.io' or query_name like '%twingate.com' or query_name like '%zohoassist.com')) and  not ((process_path like '%\appdata\local\programs\opera\%' and process_path like '%\opera.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files
aver
aver whale\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)
aver
aver whale\%') and process_path like '%\whale.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files\waterfox\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\waterfox\%') and process_path like '%\waterfox.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files alkon\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86) alkon\%') and process_path like '% alkon.exe') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\programs\midori-ng\%' and process_path like '%\midori next generation.exe') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local lock\%' and process_path like '% lock.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\avant browser\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files\avant browser\%') and process_path like '%\avant.exe') or (process_path = 'c:\program files\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe') or (process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgewebview\application\%' and process_path like '%\windowsapps\microsoftedge.exe' and (process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe')) or (process_path like '% rave.exe' and process_path like 'c:\program files ravesoftware\%') or process_path like '%	or browser\%' or (process_path like '%\msmpeng.exe' or process_path like '%\mssense.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files\seamonkey\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\seamonkey\%') and process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\vivaldi\%' and process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\phoebe\%' and process_path like '%\phoebe.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgecore\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files\microsoft\edgecore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe')) or process_path like '%\safari.exe' or (process_path = 'c:\program files\mozilla firefox irefox.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\mozilla firefox irefox.exe') or (process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\internet explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\internet explorer\iexplore.exe') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\maxthon\%' and process_path like '%\maxthon.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files\slimbrowser\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\slimbrowser\%') and process_path like '%\slimbrowser.exe')))
